revision.text:
{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Old Amber |image = [[File:Old_Amber.png|200px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Old Amber''. |location =
*[[Underground]] *[[Dungeons]] }} ==Description== The '''Old Amber''' is a type of [[Fossils|Fossil]]. ==Details== When an '''Old Amber''' is placed in the [[Pokémon Day Care]], it hatches into an Aerodactyl. ==Mine Layout== The Old Amber appears in the Underground as a 4x4 sized object.

[[File:OldAmberMine.png|100px]] ==Uses== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! Fossil !! Pokémon |- | [[File:Old_Amber.png|30px]] || [[File:Aerodactyl.png|40px]] Aerodactyl |}
{{Underground Items}} [[Category:Items]] __NOTOC__

{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Old Amber |image = [[File:Old_Amber.png|200px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Old Amber''. |location =
*[[Underground]] *[[Dungeons]] }} ==Description== The ''Old Amber'' is a type of [[Fossils|Fossil]]. ==Details== When an '''Old Amber''' is placed in the [[Pokémon Day Care]], it hatches into an Aerodactyl. ==Mine Layout== The Old Amber appears in the Underground as a 4x4 sized object.

[[File:OldAmberMine.png|100px]] ==Uses== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! Fossil !! Pokémon |- | [[File:Old_Amber.png|30px]] || [[File:Aerodactyl.png|40px]] Aerodactyl |}

revision.comment: Under the Mine Layout the fossil was called "The Old" and not "The Old Amber".
